snippet.title: Dragon Ball Fusions - Fusions Gameplay Trailer | 3DS
snippet.description:
"Visualize two rivers flowing!" Combining elements of both traditional fighting poses and water ballet, Fusions are a powerful technique! Who will you fuse with?
